title: Find surface area of a cone
contentHtml:
Write a program to find surface area of a cone

Surface area of cone = π × Radius × (Radius + Slant Height)

Radius       : 2
Slant Height : 3

Surface area : 50.26548245743669

markdown:
## Write a program to find surface area of a cone

Surface area of cone = π × `Radius` × (`Radius` + `Slant Height`)

```
Radius       : 2
Slant Height : 3

Surface area : 50.26548245743669
```
